sentences.sCn: 洛杉矶温暖干燥的气候

sentences.sContent: These flowers will not grow in cold climates.
sentences.sCn: 这些花在气候寒冷的地方无法生长。

sentences.sContent: Small businesses are finding it hard to survive in the present economic climate.
sentences.sCn: 小企业感到在当前的经济形势下很难生存。

sentences.sContent: ...Mount Huang’s humid climate is fit for the growth of tea tree...
...This is going to be the next big environmental issue after climate change...
...were being seriously affected by climate change...
...they will meet in Copenhagen in December to negotiate a new international climate treaty...
...More than 90% of the human and economic losses from climate change are occurring in poor countries...
...Annan stressed the need for the negotiations to focus on increasing the flow of money from rich to poor regions to help reduce their vulnerability to climate hazards...
...the report drew criticism from some experts on climate and risk...
...You can't deal with climate change without dealing with existing buildings...

phrases.pCn: n. 经济气候，经济形势

words.tran: 气候的；气候上的；由气候引起的；受气候影响的
气候上；由气候引起地（climatic的副词）

trans.tranOther: the typical weather conditions in a particular area
